duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle inbound and outbound calls within department KPI goals.
Accurately enter reservation details into the system.
Utilize problem-solving skills over the phone to assist hotels and clients with issues.
Utilize proper grammar and appropriate speech to notate client needs and issues.
Begin assigned duties on time and deliver on time.
Perform other duties as needed or assigned.

education_certification.credential: 6 months of call center and/or customer service experience preferred
